stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed at least 1 Corp card during his or her last turn. Choose an installed Runner card. The Runner must either add that card to the top of the stack or take 2 tags. Remove Threat Assessment from the game instead of trashing it.
text:
Play only if the Runner trashed at least 1 Corp card during his or her last turn.
Choose an installed Runner card. The Runner must either add that card to the top of the stack or take 2 tags. Remove Threat Assessment from the game instead of trashing it.
title: Threat Assessment
